name: Home Alone
description:
Home Alone is an action-arcade game developed by SEGA, Bethesda Softworks, Probe Entertainment and Imagineering. It was originally released in 1991. THQ published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Home Alone is available on Commodore / Amiga, Game Boy, NES and SNES.
Ivan Manley directed the game. George Alistair Sanger, Mark Van Hecke and Tom McMail scored the game.
